title: 'Hate isn't welcome': Neo-Nazis march with Swastika flags in Ohio, 'Trump's America' stunned
content: A group of individuals wearing masks and carrying Nazi flags marched through the Short North area of Columbus, Ohio, prompting strong condemnation from officials. Although some individuals were briefly detained, no arrests were made. Governor Mike DeWine and the City of Columbus issued statements denouncing the display of hate and affirming their commitment to protecting all residents.
summary: A group of individuals wearing masks and carrying Nazi flags marched through the Short North area of Columbus, Ohio, prompting strong condemnation from officials. Although some individuals were briefly detained, no arrests were made. Governor Mike DeWine and the City of Columbus issued statements denouncing the display of hate and affirming their commitment to protecting all residents.

title: Oklahoma superintendent Ryan Walters faces criticism over religious freedom video mandate in schools
content: Oklahoma's education superintendent, Ryan Walters, is facing backlash for mandating schools to show a video promoting his new Department of Religious Freedom and Patriotism. The video includes a prayer for Donald Trump and his team. Critics, including the state attorney general, argue that Walters lacks the authority for this mandate and that it infringes on parents' rights and religious freedom.
summary: Oklahoma's education superintendent, Ryan Walters, is facing backlash for mandating schools to show a video promoting his new Department of Religious Freedom and Patriotism. The video includes a prayer for Donald Trump and his team. Critics, including the state attorney general, argue that Walters lacks the authority for this mandate and that it infringes on parents' rights and religious freedom.

title: Prince William and Kate Middleton consider Lady Louise, the Duke of Edinburgh's daughter, a 'royal asset'
content: Lady Louise Windsor, niece of King Charles, is admired by the Prince and Princess of Wales for her down-to-earth upbringing and potential as a working royal. Despite having the option to use HRH titles, Louise and her brother were raised with the expectation of pursuing careers.
summary: Lady Louise Windsor, niece of King Charles, is admired by the Prince and Princess of Wales for her down-to-earth upbringing and potential as a working royal. Despite having the option to use HRH titles, Louise and her brother were raised with the expectation of pursuing careers.

title: Hezbollah media chief Mohammed Afif al-Naboulsi killed in Israeli strike on Beirut
content: Tensions escalate in the Middle East as Israel conducts airstrikes in Beirut and Gaza, resulting in numerous casualties. Hezbollah's chief spokesman was killed in a targeted strike, prompting retaliatory rocket fire into Israel. The strikes come as ceasefire negotiations are underway, with Lebanon accusing Israel of escalating violence.
summary: Tensions escalate in the Middle East as Israel conducts airstrikes in Beirut and Gaza, resulting in numerous casualties. Hezbollah's chief spokesman was killed in a targeted strike, prompting retaliatory rocket fire into Israel. The strikes come as ceasefire negotiations are underway, with Lebanon accusing Israel of escalating violence.

title: New York Archdiocese lays off workers to reduce financial strain from sex-abuse scandal
content: The Archdiocese of New York is laying off 18 administrative staff members, aiming to save over $1.5 million annually. The decision comes amidst financial difficulties, partly attributed to the ongoing sex abuse scandal and upcoming relocation to a smaller office.
summary: The Archdiocese of New York is laying off 18 administrative staff members, aiming to save over $1.5 million annually. The decision comes amidst financial difficulties, partly attributed to the ongoing sex abuse scandal and upcoming relocation to a smaller office.

title: Poll guru Nate Silver says Donald Trump's win is Biden's fault: 'Kamala got tough assignments'
content: Nate Silver said Harris's campaign comprising mostly ex-Biden people was reluctant to criticize Biden "out of fear of being perceived as disloyal" but Biden frequently undermined her. Silver wrote Kamala Harris has plenty of talent and sometimes and sometimes, replacement-level talent is good enough in a pinch. But this was a difficult electoral environment for Democrats.
summary: Nate Silver said Harris's campaign comprising mostly ex-Biden people was reluctant to criticize Biden "out of fear of being perceived as disloyal" but Biden frequently undermined her. Silver wrote Kamala Harris has plenty of talent and sometimes and sometimes, replacement-level talent is good enough in a pinch. But this was a difficult electoral environment for Democrats.

title: Florida woman using mother's identity for hurricane aid blames 'botox' for younger look, gets arrested
content: Florida resident Veronica Torres, 44, was apprehended for allegedly impersonating her mother to secure hurricane relief funds. Torres allegedly utilized her mother's identification to fraudulently obtain a check for $7,967, claiming hurricane-related displacement. When confronted about an age discrepancy, Torres attributed her youthful appearance to "botox treatments." She was subsequently arrested and charged with filing a false public assistance claim.
summary: Florida resident Veronica Torres, 44, was apprehended for allegedly impersonating her mother to secure hurricane relief funds. Torres allegedly utilized her mother's identification to fraudulently obtain a check for $7,967, claiming hurricane-related displacement.  When confronted about an age discrepancy, Torres attributed her youthful appearance to "botox treatments."  She was subsequently arrested and charged with filing a false public assistance claim.

title: Amid Net censorship, Pakistan offers regulated VPNs
content: Pakistan's Telecommunication Authority initiated a registration process for VPNs following a nationwide ban on unregistered ones. The government claims the ban targets militant groups, but critics view it as an attempt to stifle dissent amidst online criticism of the military and the blocking of platforms like X.
summary: Pakistan's Telecommunication Authority initiated a registration process for VPNs following a nationwide ban on unregistered ones.  The government claims the ban targets militant groups, but critics view it as an attempt to stifle dissent amidst online criticism of the military and the blocking of platforms like X.

title: 'Dirty little secret is...': Vivek Ramaswamy on which departments he and Elon Musk will ax first
content: Vivek Ramaswamy, co-leader of the Department of Government Efficiency, announced plans to drastically reduce the federal bureaucracy, including potentially eliminating entire agencies. Ramaswamy said a lot of federal staff will lose their jobs because the bureaucrats in Washington do not even work five days a week like the maximum hardworking Americans and the government do not need so many bureaucrats who are unelected.
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy, co-leader of the Department of Government Efficiency, announced plans to drastically reduce the federal bureaucracy, including potentially eliminating entire agencies.  Ramaswamy said a lot of federal staff will lose their jobs because the bureaucrats in Washington do not even work five days a week like the maximum hardworking Americans and the government do not need so many bureaucrats who are unelected.

title: US pollster J Ann Selzer retires after Iowa poll inaccurately predicted Harris ahead of Trump
content: Veteran US pollster J Ann Selzer announced her retirement from election polling after her final Iowa Poll incorrectly predicted the 2024 presidential election outcome. Despite a long history of accuracy, the poll significantly misjudged the result, prompting Selzer to step down and the Des Moines Register to revamp its polling methodology.
summary: Veteran US pollster J Ann Selzer announced her retirement from election polling after her final Iowa Poll incorrectly predicted the 2024 presidential election outcome. Despite a long history of accuracy, the poll significantly misjudged the result, prompting Selzer to step down and the Des Moines Register to revamp its polling methodology.

title: ​​​Hollywood screenwriter C Jay Cox caught in sexual encounter with minor in sting operation
content: A sting operation by streamer Vitaly has allegedly exposed Hollywood screenwriter C Jay Cox, known for films like 'Sweet Home Alabama,' for inappropriate behavior with a minor. The video, which quickly went viral, shows Cox arriving at a location believing he was meeting a 15-year-old boy.
summary: A sting operation by streamer Vitaly has allegedly exposed Hollywood screenwriter C Jay Cox, known for films like 'Sweet Home Alabama,' for inappropriate behavior with a minor. The video, which quickly went viral, shows Cox arriving at a location believing he was meeting a 15-year-old boy.

title: Bill Clinton opens up about Monica Lewinsky, Epstein in memoir: 'Frustration', 'regret'
content: In his upcoming memoir, 'Citizen: My Life After the White House', former president Bill Clinton addresses his affair with Monica Lewinsky and his association with Jeffrey Epstein. Clinton expresses regret over the Lewinsky scandal and claims he apologized publicly but admits to not speaking to her directly. “I had always thought Epstein was odd but had no inkling of the crimes he was committing," Clinton said he never visited Epstein island.
summary: In his upcoming memoir, 'Citizen: My Life After the White House', former president Bill Clinton addresses his affair with Monica Lewinsky and his association with Jeffrey Epstein. Clinton expresses regret over the Lewinsky scandal and claims he apologized publicly but admits to not speaking to her directly. “I had always thought Epstein was odd but had no inkling of the crimes he was committing," Clinton said he never visited Epstein island.

title: 'Vaccine bad for you, not Coca-Cola': RFK Jr slammed over McDonald's meal on Trump Force One
content: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., known for his health-focused campaign, surprised social media users by enjoying a McDonald's meal with Donald Trump and others on Trump Force One. "RFK jr: Vaccines are bad for you. But a McDonald's quarter pounder, 10 chicken nuggets, fries and a Coca Cola, that what makes America healthy again," British political commentator Ali Milani posted on X.
summary: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., known for his health-focused campaign, surprised social media users by enjoying a McDonald's meal with Donald Trump and others on Trump Force One. "RFK jr: Vaccines are bad for you. But a McDonald's quarter pounder, 10 chicken nuggets, fries and a Coca Cola, that what makes America healthy again," British political commentator Ali Milani posted on X.

title: Trump might not deport Prince Harry as 'favor to King Charles,' says legal expert
content: Prince Harry's US residency is under scrutiny following Donald Trump's election victory. The Heritage Foundation believes Trump's stance on immigration increases their chances of accessing Harry's visa records, potentially revealing drug use disclosures. Legal experts suggest deportation is possible, with Trump holding the authority to remove Harry or potentially pardon him as a gesture towards King Charles.
summary: Prince Harry's US residency is under scrutiny following Donald Trump's election victory. The Heritage Foundation believes Trump's stance on immigration increases their chances of accessing Harry's visa records, potentially revealing drug use disclosures. Legal experts suggest deportation is possible, with Trump holding the authority to remove Harry or potentially pardon him as a gesture towards King Charles.

title: Are Elon Musk and Shivon Zilis together? Here's what a Mar-a-Lago photo posted by his mother reveals
content: Elon Musk's relationship with Shivon Zilis, the mother of his three children, has been the subject of much speculation. While Zilis previously denied a romantic relationship, a recent photo shared by Musk's mother probably shows Zilis alongside Musk and his children at Mar-a-Lago, fueling rumors that the two may be romantically involved now.
summary: Elon Musk's relationship with Shivon Zilis, the mother of his three children, has been the subject of much speculation. While Zilis previously denied a romantic relationship, a recent photo shared by Musk's mother probably shows Zilis alongside Musk and his children at Mar-a-Lago, fueling rumors that the two may be romantically involved now.

title: Pete Hegseth paid woman who accused him of sexual assault, reveals lawyer
content: Pete Hegseth, a potential nominee for defense secretary under President-elect Donald Trump, faces sexual assault allegations from 2017. Hegseth, represented by lawyer Timothy Parlatore, denies the accusations, claiming the encounter was consensual and that he is a victim of extortion. While a police investigation occurred, no charges were filed.
summary: Pete Hegseth, a potential nominee for defense secretary under President-elect Donald Trump, faces sexual assault allegations from 2017. Hegseth, represented by lawyer Timothy Parlatore, denies the accusations, claiming the encounter was consensual and that he is a victim of extortion. While a police investigation occurred, no charges were filed.

title: RFK Jr eating a McDonald's burger? Trump Jr says Make America Healthy Again but tomorrow
content: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Donald Trump's pick for US Secretary of Health and Human Services, was photographed with a platter of McDonald's fast food alongside Trump, Donald Trump Jr., and Elon Musk. The photo sparked controversy as Kennedy previously criticized Trump's diet, calling it trash and poison. 'Make America Healthy Again starts tomorrow,' Donald Trump Jr wrote as he shared the photo.
summary: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Donald Trump's pick for US Secretary of Health and Human Services, was photographed with a platter of McDonald's fast food alongside Trump, Donald Trump Jr., and Elon Musk. The photo sparked controversy as Kennedy previously criticized Trump's diet, calling it trash and poison. 'Make America Healthy Again starts tomorrow,' Donald Trump Jr wrote as he shared the photo.

title: Ali Khamenei’s son Mojtaba set to take over as Iran's supreme leader: Report
content: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ali Khamenei, reportedly chose his son, Mojtaba, as his successor during a secret meeting of the Assembly of Experts. The decision, driven by Khamenei's declining health, was allegedly made under pressure and kept secret to avoid public backlash. Mojtaba Khamenei, known for his role in suppressing past protests, has been gradually gaining influence within the regime.
summary: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ali Khamenei, reportedly chose his son, Mojtaba, as his successor during a secret meeting of the Assembly of Experts. The decision, driven by Khamenei's declining health, was allegedly made under pressure and kept secret to avoid public backlash. Mojtaba Khamenei, known for his role in suppressing past protests, has been gradually gaining influence within the regime.

title: Did Matt Gaetz get plastic surgery to 'trick 16-year-old girls'? Satire video viral
content: The Daily Show's Desi Lydic in a satire video breaks down the plastic surgeries that Matt Gaetz, Donald Trump's attorney general pick, underwent probably "to trick 16-year-old girls into getting dinner with him". "The reasons for this could vary. It could be a health thing — or it could be because he got tired of high school girls accurately guessing his age on dating apps,” Lydic said in the viral video.

title: SNL roasts Elon Musk over DOGE: 'White African guy's first idea is slavery'
content: ​“You can’t be surprised that the white African guy’s first idea is slavery,” Weekend Update anchor Michael Che said. Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy's DOGE is looking for a few good super high IQ volunteers who need to work over 80 hours per week but there will be no payment.
